RelationshipElement.name: Water Sample pH
RelationshipElement.description: Implements a 1:N relationship between Water Samples and pH

RelationshipElement.name: Water Sample Eh
RelationshipElement.description: Implements a 1:N relationship between Water Samples and Eh

RelationshipElement.name: Sample Photolog
RelationshipElement.description: Implements a 1:N relationship between Samples and Photologs

property.name: Hole Type
property.description: Flowing or not when you arrive

property.name: Hole Open or Closed
property.description: If a kangaroo could fall in a well or if a bore is not capped

property.name: Pipes In Hole
property.description: Are pipes present and what are they made of?

property.name: Outflow Present
property.description: Does flow of water go back into the same hole as it came out?

property.name: Sampling Issues
property.description: When you cant get a clean sample from a flowing bore/well

property.name: Plant Species
property.description: If known, or common name. Take a photo to check later.

property.name: Plant Height
property.description: Please list the maximum height of the plant in metres (closest 0.5 m)

property.name: Plant Width
property.description: Please list the maximum width of the plant in metres (closest 0.5 m)

property.name: Soil Description
property.description: What does the surrounding soil look like?

property.name: Landform Description
property.description: What is the plant growing in?

property.name: Contamination
property.description: If you have selected 'Yes' please provide a description in the Annotation

property.name: Rock Observation Type
property.formatString: {{ if equal($1, "{Observation_Only}") then " - Observation" }}{{if not(in($1, ["{Sampling_Location}","{Observation_Only}"])) then "$1"}}

property.name: Rock Location Number
property.description: Number of location to which this sample/observation belongs

property.name: Core ID
property.description: Drill core ID. Fill in if sample is obtained from core

property.name: Stratigraphic unit
property.description: Name of geologic formation. Optional if known from maps.

property.name: Large-scale Structure
property.description: Basic description of what the rocks are like, e.g., massive, thickly bedded, laminated, pillow structures, etc.

property.name: Alteration
property.description: Any signs of obvious alteration, e.g., pervasive epidote, silicification around veins, etc.

property.name: Photo ID
property.description: Unique number or code allocated by creator of the image. It could be a filename or a reference number

property.name: Photo Timestamp
property.description: Time at which the photo was taken
